body.name: Tiptiper LED Bed Frame Queen Size with Storage Headboard, USB Ports & AC Outlets, Industrial Metal Platform Bed with LED Lights, No Box Spring Needed, Rustic Brown

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Full Bed with RGB LED Light

features: CHIC LED BED FRAME: Isn't it wonderful to call it a day in a mood that's soothing or throw a little night party where lights can flash with the beat of music? You could have all those colorful bedtime activities in different vibes by switching between multiple light colors, 6 brightnesses, and 4 flashing modes. App Code & remote control included.

STORAGE HEADBOARD WITH USB PORTS & CHARGING OUTLETS: The bed frame features a shelf headboard with 5 varying-sized open compartments. They give you the shelving option to place your alarm clock, table lamp, picture frames and more. 2 USB ports and 2 AC outlets allow you to charge 4 devices simultaneously without getting up (1 uesd for light strip).

SUPER STRONG, NO SQUEAK: Constructed with 13 durable steel slats and 11 metal legs, this bed frame can better distribute weight thus giving your mattress full support and preventing it from sagging. An EVA sound absorbing strip down the center bar will prevent noise from metal-on-metal rubbing.

1 BOX & NO-SWEAT ASSEMBLY: All the parts and tools you need are well labled with number and smartly packed into 1 box. Assembly munual included. Well designed structure makes it easier to put your bed together.

productInformation.value: No Box Spring Needed, Lighted, Squeak Resistant, USB Port

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Offers Plenty to Smile About Tiptiper 5-in-1 Bed Frame LED light headboard saves you a table lamp and mood lighting. The headboard shelf holds bedroom necessity, which eliminates a nightstand. A built-in power strip allows you to charge 4 devices without getting up. Underbed space can hide several boxes to stash your stuff.
Who are we to say no to an industrial bed frame with LED light headboard?

Looking to level up your bedroom? Try an led headboard. Maybe you want some mood lighting when you do some nighttime yoga, soft light when you're reading, or some bright and happy yellow light to wake you up with a smile. We thought this for you and here comes our LED bed frame. But this multi-task bed can do more than that. Keep scrolling
Makes life easier Built-in Charging Ports With 2 USB ports and 2 AC outlets, you can charge your phone, iPad, and earbuds... simultaneously without having to get up. Life can be a lot easier huh?

Storage That Replace A Nightstand & A Dresser Yes, Practical and Pretty 5 compartments in varying sizes add a hint of an open feel to the headboard. They give you the option to put your essentials and display your picture frame and more. Underbed Storage Space Underbed space can hide several boxes to stash your stuff. A nice choice for limited space.

Details Matter Well-designed Joint Well-designed joints make it easier for you to lock every slat into place. Sturdy and Quite EVA foam down the center bar prevents metal-on-metal rubbing and make sure it's quiet. Adjustable Center Legs Levelers on 3 center legs ensure stability on uneven surfaces. Corner Protectors Protects you and your family against bumping into the corner in the night.

Specification Size Queen/Full Color Black and Brown Material Premium MDF&Metal Weight Capacity 1100 lbs Box Spring Required No Feature A Built-in Power Strip Feature B LED Headboard Feature C Storage Shelf Headboard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product shipped and arrived earlier than expected. It was easy to install. And sturdy. My husband and I are on the heavier side, and feel like this frame is strong and supports us both well. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PRODUCT & SELLER HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !!
reviews.reviewText: I will easily recommend the bed for its sturdy quality. The frame and the base is metal, the boards are good quality and the built in shelves save money on extra side tables. The charging port and remote controlled light are such a bonus. My daughter says it is very comfy and loves the bed.Also, my experience with the seller was exceptional. I got this bed for my daughter and even though it suggests using 2 people to build it, I had to build it alone. It did take me 3.5 hours, but I could do it myself. In the process, by mistake a whole box got ruined. Since it was a gift to my daughter and I was feeling guilty about it, I reached out to the seller to see if there was any solution for my mistake. I was so impressed by the promt, polite and professional reply. They asked for some pictures to be able to understand the situation better and very kindly sent me the required part.I was so touched by their professional and kind gesture. They were absolutely not obligated to cover for my mistake, but they still did it. I would have given an honest 5 star review for the product, but then the way the seller deals with its customers deserves an easy 10 / 10 star.Trust me, you will not regret buying the product or deaing with the seller. Per my personal experience, I will highly recommend both.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great frame- though the lights could use work
reviews.reviewText: In my opinion the functionality of the bed frame is great! I had a fairly easy time putting it together, but the adhesive on the lights came off with the paper so obviously- the lights wouldn’t stick, but that was just a bonus for me I didn’t buy it specifically for the RGB lights but it was an added benefit for me as my room is RBG light based but over all great frame- I’d buy from them again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered the larger size the frame was bent and was really hard to put together I had ordered a a smaller size and was much easier but overall it’s a really nice frame

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well made and easy to put together very happy. My son loves it and enjoyed the lights. It's better than what I've purchased from big name brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to put together.
reviews.reviewText: Used for granddaughter bedroom. Even though having worked in the trades throughout life, this was time consuming to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great first apartment bed
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and sturdy. Headboard is narrow but will easily hold a book that you are reading in bed. Great find for young adult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars What a joke
reviews.reviewText: They claim it was so sturdy and wouldn’t squeak but some of the legs don’t even touch the ground so every time you go in and out of bed or move around it makes so much noise not to mention it shifts on the ground since it’s not supported smh the one they sent me some of the parts had to be forced together because they were warped and the led and power supply that came with that costed so much more didn’t even work they were both broken and with all this addressed to the seller they said they would eventually send the leds and power supply because that’s timely and said if I didn’t want the bed I can send it back with this label but the real kicker is I told them the box they sent it in was trashed by the shipper and what do they say I can send it in a different box and who in their right mind has a 6 foot by 2 foot box just laying around that can support 60 plus pounds smh this experience isn’t worth the trouble look for a different frame people
